entry.title: WIND WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:13 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 10:13 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:13 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
